EmailTemplate.subject: SOA No - Case No - UL Standard - Credit check
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Team,
Kindly requesting your assistance to verify if we can ship out this order of this partner.
Partner Name:
Attached to this email is the SOA of the partner for your reference.
May we kindly request for a response within 24hrs in order to communicate to the partner if there are any required payment to be done.
Should you need further assistance for any issues or concern please feel free to send us an email at : SPWR_ULSUPPORT@sunpowercorp.com
Sincerely,
SunPower UL Support Team
Global Business and Finance Services | office +00.800.786.76937
